title: Sensei to Ikenai H
description:
They are cool! They are hot! They are irresistible!
No girl will refuse to share her bed with these Sensei.

1 & 2: Baby, Baby ー A Narcissistic Scriptwriter by Takahashi Yuu (高橋ゆう)
While enjoying a meal with her friends at a restaurant, Miyako expresses her dislike for the famous & handsome scriptwriter Yuuji and calls him a narcissist. Yuuji overhears her and gets really pissed off. Later he encounters Miyako as an employee of the publishing company he has recently signed a contract with.....

3: Higurashi Naku Yuugure Ni ー An Intellectual Librarian by Saionji Michiru
Touno Sensei's wife passed away 3 years ago and since then he had locked up his heart. He wanted to lead the rest of his life in the memories of his wife and so he left his teaching job and diligently started to take care of the library his wife left him. Nene who was once Touno-sensei's student is now a regular at his library. Nene has a hidden dark past due to which she has grown averse to love. Can these two scarred souls find solace in each other?

4: Love & Peach ー A Perverted Doctor by Ashika Nozomu
Izumi is suffering from haemorrhoids. She visits the hospital for treatment but slaps the proctologist Dr. Shuu since she mistakes him to be sexually harassing her. Coincidentally, that evening, Shuu and Izumi meet at karaoke on a group date and things start to get interesting...

5. Sweet Teacher ー A Confident Trainee-Teacher by Earithen
Kiori is currently working as a trainee teacher to obtain a teacher's license without which she won't be able to graduate from the Department of Education. But the problem is that she doesn't really aim to be a teacher and so she slacks off in her duties. Her perverted supervisor offers to help her get all the required credits in return for sexual favours. Helpless Kiori yields to his demands. Can the good-hearted Kazama-kun, another trainee teacher, save Kiori from being taken advantage of?

6. Ai Wo Hore! ー A Cute Homeroom Teacher by Koishikawa Funi
After being betrayed by her first love, Futaba believes that she can't fall in love ever again. She feels herself buried under a huge pile of snow because of the unexpressed feelings that have been accumulating in her heart. Can the cute child-like Horishi-sensei, her new homeroom teacher, melt her frozen heart (and body) ?

matches.title: The Young Lady Can't Escape From Her Doting Husband ♡
